item.title: The deepest pothole I have ever seen at the junction of crown point, 23rd December
item.description:
By far the biggest most dangerous pothole I have ever seen locally Must be 30cm deep and probably half a metre long It is so dangerous I think the police should be notified There is another fairly big too going down crown dale People will cause a crash avoiding them
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Crown Dale, Upper Norwood, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Hodge House, Granville Road, NW6 5AR, 23rd December
item.description:
Litter, behind the Rails and outside the Rails. The Litter behind the Rails under the Block Name has been there for Weeks. NEEDS Sweeping Away as People Passing are Throwing Litter over the Railings once they see this Litter. Please Clear Away.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Cambridge Road, London

item.title: Pothole/poor road surface on the flyover the A2 black pro, 23rd December
item.description:
Hi, l was advised today 23/12 that the road surface/ potholes were make safe on the A2 flyover at the black prince. When driving over the flyover this afternoon 23/12, both potholes/ road surface has not been dealt with and the potholes still require attention and to be make safe for all road users
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bourne Road, Bexley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
